This wooden frame by Aapno Rajasthan gives a pleasant feel with soft colours of white and cream in silk depicts how the tribal men and women engage themselves busy with some or other kind of works. This frame gives a very calm and rustic feel to the room. Aapno Rajasthan brings this master piece to add life to your wall.

Features

Care Tip
